mapper.select: SELECT dp.game_id AS gameId, dpr.player_id AS playerId, dpr.character_id AS characterId, dpr.is_sp AS isSp, dc.name AS characterName, dc.avatar AS characterAvatar, dc.killer_avatar AS characterKillerAvatar, dpr.camp AS camp, dpr.sign AS sign, dpr.identity_desc AS identityDesc, ds.avatar AS signAvatar, dpr.is_mute AS isMute FROM d_player dp, d_character dc, d_player_record dpr LEFT JOIN d_sign ds ON dpr.sign=ds.id WHERE dp.user_Id = #{userId} AND dpr.player_id = dp.id AND dp.status != 9 AND dc.id = dpr.character_id

SELECT df.header AS curStage, dpr.action AS action, dpr.privilege AS privilege, dpr.vote AS vote FROM d_player_record dpr, d_form df, d_player dp WHERE dpr.player_id = #{playerId} AND dpr.player_id = dp.id AND dp.game_id = df.game_id ORDER BY df.id DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE d_player_record dpr SET dpr.action=#{action}, dpr.privilege=#{privilege}, dpr.vote=#{vote}, dpr.submit_time=NOW() WHERE dpr.player_id=#{playerId}
mapper.select: SELECT drs.character_name AS characterName, drs.character_avatar AS characterAvatar, drs.is_mute AS isMute FROM d_replace_skin drs WHERE drs.player_id = #{playerId}
